import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const ProgramLanding = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleApplyNow = () => { navigate('/courses'); }; const handleDownloadBrochure = () => { // Placeholder for download functionality alert('Brochure download feature coming soon!'); }; return (
